attributes.action: explain to the electorate why he should not immediately resign from the post of Prime Minister since his revelation that he got the job only because of a deal he concluded with Tony Blair at the time of the death of John Smith, the last but one elected leader of the Labour Party.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown knows that he would not have been granted a mandate by the party nor the country had he put up for election by the party or the country.  The man has now confessed that he is a fraud and fraudsters should rightly be in jail, not the Palace of Westminster!
